name: Food Fight
description: Full-stack application designed to help solve food indecision, as well as give the user real restaurant listings with details such as map locations and reviews.

name: inStock
description: CRUD app built collaboratively that tracks different warehouses and each of their unique inventories.

name: Fridge to Table
description: Designed and built during a 24hr pair programming hackathon, this application provides recipe ideas based on ingredients in a user's fridge.
